seniority_level.evidence: 4+ years experience requirement in Big Data technologies with extensive data engineering experience, typical for senior level positions

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on developing, maintaining, and testing big data solutions and data pipelines

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on streaming solutions, Kafka technologies, and developing streaming pipelines with real-time data processing

leadership_expectation.evidence: Focus on individual technical work developing and maintaining data solutions, no mention of team leadership or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: Azure Cloud Data Platform, Azure HDInsight, Azure Data Factory, Synapse

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure ecosystem

processing_paradigm.evidence: Strong emphasis on streaming solutions, Kafka technologies, and developing streaming pipelines for real-time data processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as primary orchestration tool, which is cloud-native to Azure platform

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both data warehouse concepts (SQL Server DB, Synapse) and data lake concepts (HDFS, Hadoop ecosystem)

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly requires 'Kochi, Kerala, India' location with onsite work model stated

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Kochi, Kerala) indicating specific country focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in specific location (Kochi) implies relocation needed for candidates not already in the area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and location restricted to India suggests limited visa support for international candidates

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and onsite requirement in specific location suggests limited flexibility for international students

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, suggesting work authorization in India is the primary requirement

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM Consulting position typically indicates full-time employee status with W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or perks mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, collaborative learning, or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required technical skills and preferred certifications, with balanced must-have vs nice-to-have language

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on data engineering role with well-defined technical responsibilities and requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (4+ years experience, Spark/Python/Scala, Azure) are reasonable and appropriate for senior data engineer level
